titles.title: Workforce Development Investment Act of 2020
Workforce Development Investment Act of 2020

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow employers a credit against income tax as an incentive to partner with educational institutions to improve workforce development and job training for students and a credit against income tax for certain expenses of job training programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Workforce Development Investment Act of 2020
This bill allows employers tax credits for partnering with educational institutions to improve workforce development and job training for students and for engaging in job training and apprenticeship programs.
